NOTIFICATIONS_RESTRICTED.title: Send Restrictions
NOTIFICATIONS_RESTRICTED.description: A comma separated list of email addresses and user IDs, only these users will receive notifications for testing. Default: Leave blank, no restrictions.

NOTIFICATIONS_PER_CYCLE.title: Process Per Cycle
NOTIFICATIONS_PER_CYCLE.description: How many notifications to processed per cycle, cycles keep running until queue cooldown reached

NOTIFICATIONS_COOLDOWN_AFTER.title: Cooldown Point
NOTIFICATIONS_COOLDOWN_AFTER.description: How many seconds into the run will the queue stop looking of new items to send, give the queue time to finish current cycle before next start

NOTIFICATIONS_QUEUE_WAIT.title: Empty Queue Wait
NOTIFICATIONS_QUEUE_WAIT.description: Seconds to wait before re-checking an empty queue

NOTIFICATIONS_DEBUG.title: Queue Debug Log
NOTIFICATIONS_DEBUG.description: Log debug output from the send methods

NOTIFICATIONS_AUTO_RETRY.title: Auto Retry Failed
NOTIFICATIONS_AUTO_RETRY.description: Automatically retry failed send attempts until retry limit has been reached

NOTIFICATIONS_RETRY_LIMIT.title: Send Retry Limit
NOTIFICATIONS_RETRY_LIMIT.description: Automatically delete a notification after the send retry limit has been reached
